languages.text: {n}Друкари — длинные черные плети, кажущиеся чем-то инородным на фоне ущелья — ощетиниваются оружием при вашем появлении. По рядам ксеносов пробегает злобный шепот — кажется, они едва удерживаются от того, чтобы не броситься в атаку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари — длинные черные плети, кажущиеся чем-то инородным на фоне ущелья — ощетиниваются оружием при вашем появлении. По рядам ксеносов пробегает злобный шепот — кажется, они едва удерживаются от того, чтобы не броситься в атаку.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that brandish their weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos — it seems they can barely restrain themselves from lunging at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари — длинные черные плети, кажущиеся чем-то инородным на фоне ущелья — ощетиниваются оружием при вашем появлении. По рядам ксеносов пробегает злобный шепот — кажется, они едва удерживаются от того, чтобы не броситься в атаку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, the long black scourges that bristle with weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos, it looks they can barely keep from rushing in to attack.{/n}

{n}Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, the long black scourges that bristle with weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos, it looks they can barely keep from rushing in to attack.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that brandish their weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos — it seems they can barely restrain themselves from lunging at you.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that brandish their weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos — it seems they can barely restrain themselves from lunging at you.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that brandish their weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos — it seems they can barely restrain themselves from lunging at you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Drukhari wirken fremd vor dem Hintergrund der Klamm. Lange, schwarze Gestalten, die ihre Waffen schwingen, als du dich näherst. Ein zorniges Geflüster geht durch die Reihen der Xenos. Sie müssen offenbar sehr an sich halten, um nicht auf dich loszustürmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that brandish their weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos — it seems they can barely restrain themselves from lunging at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Drukhari wirken fremd vor dem Hintergrund der Klamm. Lange, schwarze Gestalten, die ihre Waffen schwingen, als du dich näherst. Ein zorniges Geflüster geht durch die Reihen der Xenos. Sie müssen offenbar sehr an sich halten, um nicht auf dich loszustürmen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在深渊的映衬之下，眼前的黑暗灵族看起来有些陌生。当你接近时，这些瘦长的黑色身影纷纷抄起武器，愤怒的窃窃私语传遍了整支异形队伍。他们几乎无法克制住自己的怒火，仿佛马上就要朝你扑来一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that brandish their weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos — it seems they can barely restrain themselves from lunging at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在深渊的映衬之下，眼前的黑暗灵族看起来有些陌生。当你接近时，这些瘦长的黑色身影纷纷抄起武器，愤怒的窃窃私语传遍了整支异形队伍。他们几乎无法克制住自己的怒火，仿佛马上就要朝你扑来一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les Drukharis détonnent dans le paysage de la gorge, leurs longues silhouettes noires brandissant leurs armes à votre approche. Un murmure en colère gagne les rangs des xénos — ils se retiennent à grand-peine de se jeter sur vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that brandish their weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos — it seems they can barely restrain themselves from lunging at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les Drukhari détonnent dans le paysage de la gorge, leurs longues silhouettes noires brandissant leurs armes à votre approche. Un murmure en colère gagne les rangs des xénos — ils se retiennent à grand-peine de se jeter sur vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Drukhari desentonan contra el fondo de la garganta: figuras negras y larguiruchas que blanden sus armas al acercarte. Un susurro furioso recorre las filas de los xenos: parece que apenas pueden contener sus ganas de lanzarse contra ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that brandish their weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos — it seems they can barely restrain themselves from lunging at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Drukhari desentonan contra el fondo de la garganta: figuras negras y larguiruchas que blanden sus armas al acercarte. Un susurro furioso recorre las filas de los xenos: parece que apenas pueden contener sus ganas de lanzarse contra ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}峡谷を背にするデュカーリは異質なものに見える。その長く黒い影は今にも武器を振り回しそうだ。異種族の集団から怒ったような囁き声が聞こえてくる―あなたを突き刺したい衝動をかろうじて抑えているかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that brandish their weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos — it seems they can barely restrain themselves from lunging at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}峡谷を背にするデュカーリは異質なものに見える。その長く黒い影は今にも武器を振り回しそうだ。異種族の集団から怒ったような囁き声が聞こえてくる―あなたを突き刺したい衝動をかろうじて抑えているかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drukhariler, önünde durdukları manzarayla tezat bir görüntü sergiliyor. Uzun, siyah suretler; sen yaklaştığında silahlarını sallamaya başlıyor. Zeno saflarında öfkeli fısıltılar dolanıyor. Üzerine atılmamak için kendilerini zor zapt ediyorlar gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that brandish their weapons when you approach. An angry whisper runs through the ranks of the xenos — it seems they can barely restrain themselves from lunging at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhariler, önünde durdukları manzarayla tezat bir görüntü sergiliyorlar. Uzun, siyah suretler sen yaklaştığında silahlarını sallamaya başlıyor. Zeno saflarında öfkeli fısıltılar dolanıyor. Üzerine atılmamak için kendilerini zor zapt ediyorlar gibi duruyor.{/n}
